bibl.title: P. Mich. 6973: An Interpretation of a Ptolemaic Fragment of Euripides' Cresphontes.
bibl.note: P. Mich. Inv. 6973 [ed.: Katherine Lu Hsu, P. Mich. 6973: The Text of a Ptolemaic Fragment of Euripides' Cresphontes, ZPE 190 (2014) pp. 13-29, 2 pll.]. - I. Interpretation: 1. The Prologue Scene (1-82); - 2. Monologue and Prayer of Cresphontes Jr. (82-109); - 3. The Parodos (110-128). - II. The Meter.
bibl.seg: Katherine Lu Hsu, P. Mich. 6973: An Interpretation of a Ptolemaic Fragment of Euripides' Cresphontes.
